titleStmt.title: Pompey the Great, his faire Corneliaes tragedie effected by her father and husbandes downe-cast, death, and fortune. Written in French, by that excellent poet Ro: Garnier; and translated into English by Thomas Kid.
Cornélie. English
titleStmt.author: Garnier, Robert, 1544-1590.
Kyd, Thomas, 1558-1594.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by James Roberts] for Nicholas Ling,

notesStmt.note: A reissue of "Cornelia", 1594, with cancel a1.4. The first issue had James Roberts's name in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
